## default\_2() function

Load Matomo in your vitepress project.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export default function (parameters: IParameters): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

**Returns:**

## Remarks

This is mostly a generalized version of the basic matomo tracker code you'd insert in a JS page. However, since vuepress is SSR, it requires some special workarounds to make sure paq object storage happens correctly.
